name: Pegasus LowFlow Lite
description:
Pegasus LowFlow A low-fidelity component system for bulding IA concepts Figma. Get ready to prototype incredibly fast.


Low-fidelity prototypes, help in assembling product concepts that allow us to validate early in the design process.


With a low-fidelity prototype design system, you can fly through trivial whims to discover the project ideas that truly matter.


You can build concepts to run through usability testing and gain early insights into what your people really want.
